thread.title: Rahat Fateh Ali Khan and Shabab Sabri come together for a song
thread.title_full: Rahat Fateh Ali Khan and Shabab Sabri come together for a song - The Times of India

author: Kasmin Fernandes
title: Rahat Fateh Ali Khan and Shabab Sabri come together for a song
text:
"People have been calling me the Indian Rahat Fateh Ali Khan for the longest time, so it was an honour to record with him," says singer Shabab Sabri.
READ: Rahat Fateh Ali Khan: Forex violation was a mistake and I won't repeat it
Currently riding on a hatrick of hits like ' Nas Nas Mein' (Welcome Back), ' Chu Che ' (Remix) from Singh Is Bliing and 'Jalte Diye' from Salman Khan starrer Prem Ratan Dhan Payo, Shabab is poised with his next, a romantic song that also features Rahat Fateh Ali Khan in another version.
For the latest in Music news, like us on Facebook >>> TOIEntertain
Shabab has a tight association with Sajid Wajid and has done a string of film songs for them in the past. Says Shabab, "Wajid introduced me as the Indian Rahat. People say that my voice is my like Rahat Fateh Ali Khan's.
For more interesting Music news and pictures follow us on Pinterest>>> timesofindia
As for Rahat sahab, he has done a great job on the song. We both have a different flavour." It was quite a memorable moment for Shabab to come face to face with the man his voice has been likened too. Shabab has also done a male duet with Divya Kumar for the same untitled film. Ask him how the song will fare, and he says, "When the track is out, time will tell."
LISTEN: Songs of Rahat Fateh Ali Khan on Gaana.com
